perturbation.original_text:
5.3 Royalty/Commission Payments. Dr. Murray will receive an annual royalty on net sales (defined as gross sales minus returns) for any products (the "Dr. Murray Products") developed by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold. The Dr. Murray Products will be listed on Schedule A attached hereto as they are developed and added to product portfolio. During each year of this agreement, Dr. Murray will be paid no later than the 30st day of January based on the cumulative Net Sales of the Dr. Murray Products for the preceding 12 months based upon the following scale:

Net Sales per 12 Months Royalty $2,000,001 to $3,500,000 $150,000 $3,500,001 to $5,000,000 $250,000 $5,000,001 to $10,000,000 $350,000 $10,000,001 to $25,000,000 $500,000 $25,000,001 to $50,000,000 $1,000,000 $50,000,001 to $75,000,000 $1,500,000 $75,000,001 to $100,000,000 $2,000,000 Greater than $100,000,000 $2,500,000
perturbation.changed_text:
5.3 Royalty/Commission Payments. Dr. Murray will receive an annual royalty on net sales (defined as total revenue) for any products (the "Dr. Murray Products") developed by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold. The Dr. Murray Products will be listed on Schedule A attached hereto as they are developed and added to product portfolio. During each year of this agreement, Dr. Murray will be paid no later than the 30st day of January based on the cumulative Net Sales of the Dr. Murray Products for the preceding 12 months based upon the following scale:

Net Sales per 12 Months Royalty $2,000,001 to $3,500,000 $150,000 $3,500,001 to $5,000,000 $250,000 $5,000,001 to $10,000,000 $350,000 $10,000,001 to $25,000,000 $500,000 $25,000,001 to $50,000,000 $1,000,000 $50,000,001 to $75,000,000 $1,500,000 $75,000,001 to $100,000,000 $2,000,000 Greater than $100,000,000 $2,500,000
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflicting definition of 'net sales'. Originally, net sales are explicitly defined as 'gross sales minus returns'. The modification defines 'net sales' as 'total revenue,' which generally encompasses all income without deducting for returns. This contradiction makes it unclear which definition should be used for calculating royalties, leading to disputes over payments.

perturbation.original_text: (b) Except as otherwise stated herein as pertaining only to a Services Term, this Agreement shall remain in effect for ten years, unless terminated in accordance with Sections 6.1 (a) or 6.2(b). For the avoidance of doubt, it is the intent of the parties that subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, the royalty payments set out above shall continue in perpetuity for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold.
perturbation.changed_text: (b) Except as otherwise stated herein as pertaining only to a Services Term, this Agreement shall remain in effect for ten years, unless terminated in accordance with Sections 6.1 (a) or 6.2(b). For the avoidance of doubt, it is the intent of the parties that subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, the royalty payments set out above shall continue for the shorter of (i) ten years from the effective date or (ii) for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the duration of royalty payments. The original text states royalty payments continue 'in perpetuity' for as long as the products are sold, implying an indefinite period. The changed text limits this by stating that royalty payments will only continue for a shorter period of either ten years or as long as the products are sold, introducing ambiguity about when the payments cease, which could create conflict.

perturbation.original_text: ARTICLE 9 - GENERAL LEGAL MATTERS (6) Disputes: The parties shall first attempt to resolve any dispute related to this Agreement in an amicable manner by mediation conducted in Phoenix, Arizona. The mediation shall take place no more than sixty (60) days after written notice from the party requesting such mediation. Any disputes remaining unresolved after mediation shall be settled by binding arbitration conducted in Phoenix, Arizona under the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association (AAA). Notwithstanding the foregoing, (i) the AAA shall not mediate or arbitrate the dispute, and the parties shall agree upon a mediator and arbitrator, if necessary, but if the parties cannot agree upon such mediator or arbitrator, Judicial Dispute Resolution of Phoenix, AZ shall select one of its mediators/arbitrators to serve pursuant to this Agreement, and (ii) either party may apply to any court of competent jurisdiction in Maricopa County, Arizona for such equitable, extraordinary or injunctive relief as may be necessary to enforce the respective rights of the parties under this Agreement. The prevailing party in arbitration or litigation shall be entitled to recover its costs and reasonable attorney's fees and expenses, as determined by the arbitrator or judge, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: ARTICLE 9 - GENERAL LEGAL MATTERS (6) Disputes: The parties may, at their sole discretion, attempt to resolve any dispute related to this Agreement through direct negotiation. Should negotiation fail, the parties shall then engage in mediation conducted wherever is most convenient for Dr. Murray. The mediation shall take place no more than one hundred twenty (120) days after the start of conflict. Any disputes remaining unresolved after mediation shall be subject to non-binding arbitration conducted in Seattle, Washington under rules agreed by Dr. Murray. Notwithstanding the foregoing, (i) all disputes must be initially presented to the American Arbitration Association, and (ii) EHS or EHN alone may apply to any court of competent jurisdiction in Delaware for such equitable, extraordinary or injunctive relief as may be necessary to enforce the respective rights of the parties under this Agreement. The prevailing party in litigation, but not arbitration, shall be entitled to recover its costs and reasonable attorney's fees and expenses, as determined by the judge, as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces multiple contradictions related to dispute resolution. First, it changes 'shall first attempt to resolve' via mediation to 'may, at their sole discretion, attempt to resolve' via direct negotiation, making the initial step optional. It also changes the location of mediation to wherever Dr. Murray is most comfortable. It now specifies the dispute shall be presented initially to the American Arbitration Association (AAA), contradicting that the mediation shall happen wherever Murray is most comfortable, while also contradicting the original (i) in that previously AAA was not meant to mediate or arbitrate the dispute. Also, it now allows EHS or EHN alone to apply to any court of competent jurisdiction in Delaware, and makes arbitration non-binding.
